title: Finding the LCD
text: First, find the least common denominator.
speech: First, find the least common denominator.
pacedSpeech: First, find the least common denominator.

title: Rewriting the Expression
text: Rewrite each fraction as an equivalent fraction with the LCD.
speech: Rewrite each fraction as an equivalent fraction with the LCD.
pacedSpeech: Rewrite each fraction as an equivalent fraction with the LCD.

title: Combining Terms
text: Then, add the fractions and simplify if applicable.
speech: Then, add the fractions and simplify if applicable.
